resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104776</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forests and fires: The longleaf pine savanna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wälder und Feuer: Die longleaf 
Kiefersavanne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forêts et feux : La savane de pin de 
longleaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Florestas e fogos: O savanna do pinho do 
longleaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foreste e fuochi: La savanna del pino del 
longleaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δάση και πυρκαγιές: Η σαβάνα πεύκων longleaf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosques y fuegos: La sabana del pino del 
longleaf</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This Carolina Environmental Diversity Explorations "virtual field trip" examines the role of fire in maintaining the longleaf pine savanna as well as other rare plant communities found in Camp Lejune, North Carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Carolina virtuellen, welches die 
Klimaverschiedenartigkeit-Erforschungen "Reise" auffangen, 
überprüft die Rolle des Feuers, wenn es die longleaf Kiefersavanne 
sowie andere seltene Betriebsgemeinschaften beibehält, die im Lager 
Lejune, Nord-Carolina gefunden werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les explorations environnementales "voyage de cette
diversité de la Caroline de zone virtuel" examine le rôle du feu en 
mettant à jour la savane de pin de longleaf comme d'autres 
communautés rares d'usine trouvées dans le camp Lejune, Caroline 
du nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As explorações ambientais "desengate desta 
diversidade de Carolina de campo virtual" examinam o papel do fogo em 
manter o savanna do pinho do longleaf assim como outras comunidades 
raras da planta encontradas no acampamento Lejune, North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le esplorazioni ambientali "viaggio di questa 
diversità della Carolina di campo virtuale" esamina il ruolo di fuoco
nell'effettuare la savanna del pino del longleaf come pure altre 
Comunità rare della pianta trovate nell'accampamento Lejune, 
North.carolina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνήσεις "εικονικό ταξίδι αυτής της 
ποικιλομορφίας της Καρολίνας οι περιβαλλοντικές πεδίων" εξετάζουν
το ρόλο της πυρκαγιάς στη διατήρηση της σαβάνας πεύκων 
longleaf καθώς επίσης και άλλων σπάνιων κοινοτήτων 
εγκαταστάσεων που βρίσκονται στο στρατόπεδο Lejune, βόρεια 
Καρολίνα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las exploraciones ambientales "disparo al campo de 
esta diversidad de Carolina virtual" examinan el papel del fuego en 
mantener la sabana del pino del longleaf tan bien como otras 
comunidades raras de la planta encontradas en el campo Lejune, 
Carolina del Norte.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086037</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104776</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/forests-and-fires-the-longleaf-pine-savanna</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
